name: Rituraj kushwaha
about: My areas of interest are Software development, Data Science and AI. I like learning about new technologies, their advancements and their applications in fields for solving challenging problems with practical impact. The idea that something I create can impact someone across the world now, or in the future is what drives my passion for Technology. I get exotic energy from playing musical instruments, badminton and traveling. For more visit: https://riturajkush.github.io/

experience.title: Machine Learning Intern
experience.description:
- Worked on module of uIDE (Utopia Intelligent Data Enrichment) project which involved text classification of extracted textual data from image.

- Worked across Software Development Life Cycle to develop REST API for PID (Pipeline and

Instrumentation Design) project which helped in automating the extraction of stored equipment

and sub equipment tags and displaying in desired format.

- Gained experience in deep diving into codebases, writing industry standard code, maintaining

documentation, writing logs for applications and pushing the changes.
experience.description_html:
- Worked on module of uIDE (Utopia Intelligent Data Enrichment) project which involved text classification of extracted textual data from image.
- Worked across Software Development Life Cycle to develop REST API for PID (Pipeline and
Instrumentation Design) project which helped in automating the extraction of stored equipment
and sub equipment tags and displaying in desired format.
- Gained experience in deep diving into codebases, writing industry standard code, maintaining
documentation, writing logs for applications and pushing the changes.

experience.title: Python Development and Analytics Intern
experience.description:
- Wrote python scripts for web scrapping of data from websites and storing in excel sheet.

- Created a dashboard using Elastic Stack for analysis of mongodb logs which helped the enterprise to efficiently and quickly track down errors and resource utilisation.

- Set up and integrated Elastic APM for managing and monitoring performance of backend applications.
experience.description_html:
- Wrote python scripts for web scrapping of data from websites and storing in excel sheet.
- Created a dashboard using Elastic Stack for analysis of mongodb logs which helped the enterprise to efficiently and quickly track down errors and resource utilisation.
- Set up and integrated Elastic APM for managing and monitoring performance of backend applications.
